statements: SELECT call_id, caller_name, call_date, escalation_level, call_duration FROM call_escalation_patterns ORDER BY call_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM call_escalation_patterns WHERE caller_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM call_escalation_patterns
SELECT DISTINCT caller_name FROM call_escalation_patterns
SELECT call_id, caller_name, escalation_level FROM call_escalation_patterns WHERE escalation_level = 2
SELECT * FROM call_escalation_patterns WHERE escalation_level > 2 ORDER BY call_date DESC, call_duration ASC
SELECT caller_name, escalation_level FROM call_escalation_patterns WHERE call_duration > 120 ORDER BY caller_name
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call_duration FROM call_escalation_patterns WHERE escalation_level < 5
SELECT caller_name, COUNT(call_id) AS num_calls FROM call_escalation_patterns GROUP BY caller_name
SELECT * FROM call_escalation_patterns WHERE call_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM escalation_callers;
SELECT caller_name, caller_department FROM escalation_callers WHERE caller_department = 'Support';
SELECT caller_id, log_description, log_timestamp FROM escalation_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT caller_name, caller_department FROM escalation_callers WHERE caller_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM escalation_logs WHERE escalation_level = 2;
SELECT * FROM escalation_callers WHERE caller_id = 1;
SELECT caller_name, caller_department FROM escalation_callers WHERE caller_department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM escalation_logs WHERE escalation_level >= 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM escalation_callers ec JOIN escalation_logs el ON ec.caller_id = el.caller_id WHERE ec.caller_department = 'HR';
SELECT ec.caller_name, el.log_description FROM escalation_callers ec JOIN escalation_logs el ON ec.caller_id = el.caller_id WHERE el.escalation_level = 3 ORDER BY el.log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM call_records;
SELECT caller_name, call_timestamp FROM call_records WHERE escalation_level > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM support_agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_role FROM support_agents WHERE department = 'Customer Support';
SELECT * FROM escalation_history ORDER BY escalation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_records ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT caller_name, COUNT(call_id) AS call_count FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_name;
SELECT c.call_id, c.caller_name, eh.escalated_to FROM call_records c JOIN escalation_history eh ON c.call_id = eh.call_id WHERE c.escalation_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM support_agents WHERE department = 'Technical Support' ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_role, MAX(agent_id) AS max_agent_id FROM support_agents GROUP BY agent_name, agent_role ORDER BY max_agent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM calls ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT caller_name, call_timestamp FROM calls WHERE escalation_level = 2;
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT call_id, agent_id, escalation_id FROM call_history WHERE call_duration > 10 ORDER BY call_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM calls WHERE caller_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM calls
SELECT caller_name, call_timestamp FROM calls ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC
SELECT c.caller_name, s.agent_name FROM calls c JOIN support_agents s ON c.call_id = s.agent_id
SELECT c.caller_name, e.escalation_name FROM calls c JOIN escalation_levels e ON c.escalation_level = e.escalation_id WHERE c.call_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT c.caller_name AS customer_name, a.agent_name AS support_agent, ch.call_duration AS duration_minutes FROM calls c JOIN support_agents a ON c.call_id = a.agent_id JOIN call_history ch ON c.call_id = ch.call_id ORDER BY ch.call_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM calls;
SELECT caller_id, agent_id, call_timestamp FROM calls ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT history_id, escalation_id, previous_level, new_level FROM escalation_history;
SELECT * FROM agents WHERE agent_department = 'Sales';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_department = 'Support' ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT calls.call_id, calls.call_timestamp, agents.agent_name FROM calls JOIN agents ON calls.agent_id = agents.agent_id WHERE calls.escalation_level > 2;
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(call_id) AS total_calls FROM agents JOIN calls ON agents.agent_id = calls.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name HAVING total_calls > 5;

SELECT agents.agent_name, escalations.escalation_reason, escalation_history.previous_level FROM agents JOIN escalations ON agents.agent_id = escalations.escalation_id JOIN escalation_history ON escalations.escalation_id = escalation_history.escalation_id ORDER BY escalation_history.escalation_timestamp DESC;
